connectionString.label: PostgreSQL Connection String
connectionString.help: PG connection URL. Falls back to ~/.shadowdb.json if omitted.

embedding.provider.label: Embedding Provider
embedding.provider.help: ollama | openai | openai-compatible | voyage | gemini | command

embedding.dimensions.label: Embedding Dimensions
embedding.dimensions.help: Must match existing vector column dimensions (default: 768)

embedding.baseUrl.label: Provider Base URL
embedding.baseUrl.help: Optional base URL override (OpenAI-compatible, Voyage, Gemini)

embedding.headers.label: Extra Headers
embedding.headers.help: Optional extra headers sent with embedding requests

embedding.command.label: Embedding Command
embedding.command.help: For provider=command. Command receives JSON on stdin and must return JSON embedding

table.label: Table Name
table.help: PG table with content + embedding columns

writes.enabled.label: Write Operations Enabled
writes.enabled.help: Master gate for memory_write, memory_update, memory_delete tools (default: false)

writes.autoEmbed.label: Auto-Embed on Write
writes.autoEmbed.help: Generate embedding automatically on write/update (default: true)

writes.retention.purgeAfterDays.label: Retention: Purge After Days
writes.retention.purgeAfterDays.help: Permanently remove soft-deleted records after N days (default: 30, 0 = never)

writes.retention.stalePurgeDays.label: Retention: Stale Purge Days
writes.retention.stalePurgeDays.help: Permanently remove records not accessed in N days (default: 0 = disabled)

startup.enabled.label: Startup Hydration Enabled
startup.enabled.help: Inject startup identity/rules context from DB before runs (default: true)

startup.maxChars.label: Startup Max Chars
startup.maxChars.help: Max characters injected from startup records per hydration (default: 4000)

startup.cacheTtlMs.label: Startup Digest Cache TTL (ms)
startup.cacheTtlMs.help: For mode=digest, reinject after TTL even if digest unchanged (default: 600000)

startup.maxCharsByModel.label: Model-Aware Max Chars
startup.maxCharsByModel.help: Map of model substring patterns to maxChars overrides. First match wins, falls back to startup.maxChars.

enabled.description: Master gate for write tools (memory_write, memory_update, memory_delete). Default: false.

autoEmbed.description: Auto-generate embedding on write/update. Default: true.

purgeAfterDays.description: Permanently remove soft-deleted records after N days (default: 30, 0 = never)

stalePurgeDays.description: Permanently remove records not accessed in N days (default: 0 = disabled)

maxCharsByModel.description: Model substring -> maxChars overrides. First matching pattern wins.
